# HKElectrocardiogramQuery.Result.error(_:)

**Case**

An error occurred while accessing the voltage measurements.

## Declaration

```swift
case error(any Error)
```

## Results

- **HKElectrocardiogramQuery.Result.measurement(_:)**: A single voltage measurement.
- **HKElectrocardiogramQuery.Result.done**: The query has finished returning voltage measurements.

items.description: The query has finished returning voltage measurements.
